creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Standing lion with extended claws and flame-like hair on back of legs, tail and head; open mouth with slightly protruding tongue and bared teeth; dots of gilding throughout; tail is completely removable; hinged head
object_name: Temple Lion Censer, one of a pair
title: Temple Lion Censer, one of a pair
